about_the_game:
Boobs, boobs, boobs, really a lot of boobs, boobs around you :)

Do you want to play with character that have 6 boobs? Well, I have added it for you.

Fun with boobs DLC is dedicated to all boob's fans.

Do you like to play with boobs? Do you have some favorite size of boobs that will really please your eye? Using settings, you can set up any boobs size: small, medium, big, huge.... any.

Give it a try and you will not regret, the cute girls from this DLC will fulfill all your wishes.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you can replace main character on scene.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC characters are completely naked and have working genitals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: 12 Core CPU 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon 6000 At last 8 Gb of the VRAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
